about_the_game: The Ranger: Border Hunt is first part of "The Ranger" series. You are Colt and you have to escape from a monster in a dark forest. The player can't fight back yet - the only option is to run avoid dangers, and try to survive as long as possible.
detailed_description: The Ranger: Border Hunt is first part of "The Ranger" series. You are Colt and you have to escape from a monster in a dark forest. The player can't fight back yet - the only option is to run avoid dangers, and try to survive as long as possible.
legal_notice: "The Ranger: Border Hunt" is in no way related to the "The Ranger's Apprentice" series by John Flanagan.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 / SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple GPU or Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro GPU / Radeon Pro 5500M
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

name: The Ranger: Border Hunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 940 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GeForce GTX 770 / 4 GB Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

short_description: You are Colt and you have to escape from a monster in a dark forest.
